rgba-color-picker.plugin.name: RGBA Color Picker
rgba-color-picker.homepage.description: Select and store colors using RGBA, RGB, HEX or HSL format.
rgba-color-picker.homepage.about.title: About this plugin
rgba-color-picker.homepage.about.descrip: The {pluginName} plugin adds a custom field to the Strapi admin panel, allowing users to choose and store colors in multiple formats:
rgba-color-picker.homepage.howToUse.desc: In the content-type builder, add a new field and select {pluginName}. Then choose your preferred color format in the field settings.
rgba-color-picker.field.label: Color Picker
rgba-color-picker.field.color.label: Color
rgba-color-picker.field.alpha.label: Transparency ({percentage}%)
rgba-color-picker.field.manual.label: Manual input ({format})
rgba-color-picker.field.manual.hint: You can paste values like rgba(...), #hex or hsla(...)
rgba-color-picker.field.preview.label: Preview
